Package org.consensusj.bitcoin.proxy.jsonrpc

package org.consensusj.bitcoin.proxy.jsonrpc
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    ExtraRpcRegistry.RPCMethodInvoke
     
    RxJsonRpcProxyService
    Interface for proxying JSON-RPC requests using Reactive Streams Publisher and Micronaut {link @HttpResponse} types.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    CachedRpcService
    This prototype caching service implementation works best for RPC methods that: take no parameters are updated with every new block have no data/fields that change between blocks TODO: Add eager caching for a Set of methods
    ExtraRpcRegistry
    A place to register extra RPC methods that are (typically) implemented on the proxy server itself.
    JsonRpcClient
     
    JsonRpcProxyConfiguration
    Proxy Server Configuration Bean
    JsonRpcProxyController
    Micronaut controller for proxying JSON-RPC requests to a remote JSON-RPC server.
    RxBitcoinJsonRpcProxyService
    Implementation of RxJsonRpcProxyService for Bitcoin.
